title: Bernhard Hoëcker
summary: Bernhard Hoëcker ([ˈhoːʔɛkɐ]; born Bernhard Hoecker-von Mühlenfels; 20 March 1970) is a German comedian, actor and television presenter. He is best known for the spoof show Switch, as well as being a permanent member of the previous Genial guessing team (2003–2011) Genial Daneben.
